definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
to be lost/to be ruined/to perish/to wither away
hear the wind and lose gall (idiom); terror-stricken at the news

sentences.english: Glebe's old hero bereavement, Hugh death cause.
sentences.chinese: 天荒地老英雄丧，国破家亡事业休。

sentences.english: At one point, she nearly died after catching pneumonia and had to undergo an emergency tracheotomy.
sentences.chinese: 她因为肺炎差点儿丧了命，紧急气管切开术救了她。

sentences.english: The cook, he makes his knife so sharp To stab it then into my heart.
sentences.chinese: 那厨子正把他的刀磨亮，就要把我的命儿丧。

sentences.english: Careless driving cost him his life.
sentences.chinese: 开车不小心使他丧了命。

sentences.english: They would rather go fishing stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 他们宁展丧钓鱼，也不愿待在家鲤。

sentences.english: I know that F. P. A insurance doesn't cover losses on consumer goods.
sentences.chinese: 我知道安然险不包孕斲丧品的各种丧失踪。

sentences.english: So, they take this enormous risk and many of them have died.
sentences.chinese: 所以，他们冒著这么巨大的风险，而且许多也丧了命。

sentences.english: As for me, I must look after the anchoring, and dress the ship in mourning.
sentences.chinese: 我还得去照顾抛锚和给这只船挂丧的事。

sentences.english: The main state on "self in Chuang-Tzu's theory is "I Lose Myself.
sentences.chinese: 庄子关于自我问题的核心表述是“吾丧我”。

sentences.english: Qing Dynasty Opium War decline, the country mourning the right of the Treaty of Nanking.
sentences.chinese: 鸦片战争清朝衰，南京条约丧国权。

sentences.english: Twenty-four hours later, he had almost lost his life inside Vatican City.
sentences.chinese: 二十四小时后，他险些在梵帝冈城丧了命。

sentences.english: Every single time you exercise more than usual- you use up calories and flocated on.
sentences.chinese: 每一次你疏通比泛泛多，你斲丧的热量和脂肪。

definition: (neologism c. 2017) (coll.) chill about everything (typically used to describe young people who don't buy into aspirational society)
(loanword) kitsch, in a sense that originates in the writing of Milan Kundera: getting emotional about sth due to the influence of social conditioning
